column5: Planning a boys trip at the end of sept.  Looking for a lake  that has good pike bass fishing.  As well a a decent cheap lodge.  Was thinking no more than a couple hours north of temagami

go to elephant lake lodge in bancroft  fish 3 lakes benoir/elephant/bapteatste  it will only cost friday to sunday at most $180 per person $90 as night all meals included (american plan)with cabin and the fishing is good there  or limerick lake lodge  $100 a night all inclusive (3 meals a day) and cabin
Im leaning towards papa johns in temagami anyone familiar

I was gonna say Temagami...can't comment on Papa John's....though I AM partial to the name   Couple really nice places on Lady Evelyn though....watch the banner ads here on OFC...Gowganda has a few nice places as well....
if you are thinking temagami check tamarvacations.com.  great spot for the guys, starting with a barge ride across temagami and a stay at a very private island (see - no rules in the dictionary)
